How Fafnir Unlocks Hidden Cost Savings

All-in-One Spend Dashboard

s Say goodbye to multiple fragmented and siloed systems. Fafnir provides a single dashboard to monitor and control all your indirect spend.

Granular Spend Classification and Cost Benchmarking

Understand your data better, with our AI-powered spend classification and real-time cost benchmarking.

Proactive Cost Controls

Fafnir helps you set up cost controls and alerts to prevent overspending and fraud using a no-code workflow builder.
